#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

USERS_FILE="${1:-users.txt}"

if [ ! -f "$USERS_FILE" ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 <users_file>"
    echo ""
    echo "File format (CSV):"
    echo "username,fullname,groups"
    echo "alice,Alice Johnson,developers,sudo"
    echo "bob,Bob Smith,developers"
    exit 1
fi

while IFS=, read -r username fullname groups; do
    # Skip header and empty lines
    if [[ "$username" == "username" ]] || [[ -z "$username" ]]; then
        continue
    fi
    
    echo "Creating user: $username"
    
    # Create user
    if id "$username" &>/dev/null; then
        echo "  User $username already exists, skipping"
        continue
    fi
    
    sudo useradd -m -s /bin/bash -c "$fullname" "$username"
    
    # Set temporary password
    echo "$username:ChangeMe123" | sudo chpasswd
    
    # Force password change on first login
    sudo passwd -e "$username"
    
    # Add to groups
    if [ -n "$groups" ]; then
        IFS=',' read -ra GROUP_ARRAY <<< "$groups"
        for group in "${GROUP_ARRAY[@]}"; do
            group=$(echo "$group" | xargs)  # Trim whitespace
            if getent group "$group" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                sudo usermod -aG "$group" "$username"
                echo "  Added to group: $group"
            else
                echo "  Warning: Group $group doesn\'t exist"
            fi
        done
    fi
    
    echo "  ‚úì User $username created (password: ChangeMe123)"
done < "$USERS_FILE"

echo ""
echo "‚úì User creation complete!"
echo "All users have temporary password: ChangeMe123"
echo "They will be forced to change it on first login."
EOF

username,fullname,groups
alice,Alice Johnson,developers,sudo
bob,Bob Smith,developers
charlie,Charlie Brown,designers
EOF

#!/bin/bash

echo "=== USER AUDIT REPORT ==="
echo "Generated: $(date)"
echo ""

echo "--- Users with sudo access ---"
getent group sudo | cut -d: -f4 | tr ',' '\n'
getent group wheel 2>/dev/null | cut -d: -f4 | tr ',' '\n'
echo ""

echo "--- Users with /bin/bash shell ---"
awk -F: '$7 == "/bin/bash" {print $1}' /etc/passwd
echo ""

echo "--- Recently created users (last 30 days) ---"
find /home -maxdepth 1 -type d -mtime -30 -exec basename {} \;
echo ""

echo "--- Locked accounts ---"
awk -F: '($2 ~ /^!/) {print $1}' /etc/shadow 2>/dev/null | grep -v "^root"
echo ""

echo "--- Users without passwords ---"
awk -F: '($2 == "" || $2 == "!") {print $1}' /etc/shadow 2>/dev/null
echo ""

echo "--- All groups and members ---"
getent group | awk -F: '$4 != "" {printf "%-20s %s\n", $1, $4}'
EOF
